document.full_text: egypt's prime minister essam sharaf vowed saturday to press a fight against corruption, responding to public pressure to speed up investigations into alleged graft by allies of ousted president hosni mubarak.
document.title: egypt's prime minister vows to stamp out corruption
lines_and_colors: egypt's prime minister essam sharaf vowed saturday to press a fight against corruption, responding to public pressure to speed up investigations into alleged graft by allies of ousted president hosni mubarak.
